name: Turbulence Ahead
description:
Fly a helicopter through a hurricane! Use the mouse to control the helicopter, and avoid running into turbulence. Explore a rich, watercolor world.

Yes, the helicopter is caught in a hurricane. "But if it flies long enough it will escape, right?" No, this is an endless runner. If you play long enough, you will see that the background is looping - the helicopter is flying in circles. Silly helicopter!
